title: Mormon Manti Tabernacle renovated with a goal that people 'won't notice anything different'
content:
Manti â¢ More than 100 years after his great-great-great-great-great-grandfather Isaac Morley led the first Mormon settlers into Manti, Matt Christensen stood in the townâs tabernacle, reviewing the restoration work he oversaw as a church facilities manager. With a staff of professional architects, historians and even an artist, the restoration team took care to preserve â and, in some cases, reveal â the buildingâs unique 19th-century details. âThe whole intent of this project,â Christensen said...
